14 namespace smacc
15 {
16 // this class describes the concept of Smacc State Machine in an abastract way.
17 // The SmaccStateMachineBase inherits from this state machine and from
18 // statechart::StateMachine<> (via multiple inheritance)
19 class ISmaccStateMachine
20 {
21 public:
22  ISmaccStateMachine( SignalDetector* signalDetector);
23 
24  virtual ~ISmaccStateMachine();
25 
26  template <typename SmaccComponentType>
27  void requiresComponent(SmaccComponentType*& storage, ros::NodeHandle nh=ros::NodeHandle())
28  {
29  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
30  std::string pluginkey = demangledTypeName<SmaccComponentType>();
31  SmaccComponentType* ret;
32 
33  auto it = plugins_.find(pluginkey);
34 
35  if( it == plugins_.end())
36  {
37  ROS_INFO("%s smacc component is required. Creating a new instance.", pluginkey.c_str());
38 
39  ret = new SmaccComponentType();
40  ret->init(nh);
41  ret->setStateMachine(this);
42  plugins_ [pluginkey] = static_cast<smacc::ISmaccComponent*>(ret);
43  ROS_INFO("%s resource is required. Done.", pluginkey.c_str());
44  }
45  else
46  {
47  ROS_INFO("%s resource is required. Found resource in cache.", pluginkey.c_str());
48  ret = dynamic_cast<SmaccComponentType*>(it->second);
49  }
50 
51  storage = ret;
52  }
53 
54  template <typename T>
55  bool getGlobalSMData(std::string name, T& ret)
56  {
57  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
58  ROS_WARN("get SM Data lock acquire");
59  bool success = false;
60 
61  if(!globalData_.count(name))
62  {
63  ROS_WARN("get SM Data - data do not exist");
64  success = false;
65  }
66  else
67  {
68  ROS_WARN("get SM DAta -data exist. accessing");
69  try
70  {
71  boost::any v = globalData_[name];
72  ROS_WARN("get SM DAta -data exist. any cast");
73  ret = boost::any_cast<T>(v);
74  success = true;
75  ROS_WARN("get SM DAta -data exist. success");
76  }
77  catch(boost::bad_any_cast& ex)
78  {
79  ROS_ERROR("bad any cast: %s", ex.what());
80  success = false;
81  }
82  }
83 
84  ROS_WARN("get SM Data lock release");
85  return success;
86  }
87 
88  template <typename T>
89  void setGlobalSMData(std::string name, T value)
90  {
91  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(m_mutex_);
92  ROS_WARN("set SM Data lock acquire");
93  globalData_[name] = value;
94  }
95 
97  void registerActionClientRequest(ISmaccActionClient* component);
98 
99 private:
100 
101  std::mutex m_mutex_;
102 
103  std::map<std::string, smacc::ISmaccComponent*> plugins_;
104 
105  std::map<std::string, boost::any> globalData_;
106 
107  //event to notify to the signaldetection thread that a request has been created
108  SignalDetector* signalDetector_;
109 };
110 }
